title: Saguaro National Park: Kids & Youth
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Kids & Youth             Kids & Youth         Kids learn about cactus in Saguaro National Park Photo courtesy of Kanekoa-Madrid  Junior Ranger Programs - Find out more about the adventure and honor of becoming a Junior Ranger. Wilderness Camp Programs - Get behind the scenes and into the wild with Saguaro Wilderness Camps! Educational Programs - Programs are available for Teachers and Students during the school year. View Current Ranger Program Schedules - Kids can attend any of these programs to fulfill their Junior Ranger Requirements. Become a WebRanger - This is the National Park Service's on-line Junior Ranger program for kids of all ages. Desert Diversity Games - Five fun and educational games to learn about the Sonoran Desert ecosystem.
